sentence.Network_en: He fell victim to her enticement.
He ought to curb his excessive internal desires and resist unreasonable enticement.
sentence.Network_cn: 控制过度内欲、抵制不当外惑.

sentence.Network_en: Human's value, is suffering the enticement one instantaneous to decide.
sentence.Network_cn: 人的价值, 在遭受诱惑的壹瞬间被决定.

list.abs: cut back on sugar . stress hormones and brain chemicals might entice you to nibble on sweets , but remember , the first two bites satisfy brain chemistry . anything after that is pure indulgence .削减糖的摄入。应激激素和脑化学物质可能会吸引你吃糖，但请记住，吃两口就足以满足大脑需要。再多吃就纯属放纵了。
people entice you to join in will be less than trustworthy .那些怂恿你加入的人是不值得信任的。
enticements gradually included nifty water-proof swollen thorns to live in , handy nectar fountains , and special ant-food buds atleaf tips .诱饵渐渐囊括了可供蚂蚁居住的防水的漂亮巨刺，现成的蜜露泉，和专为蚂蚁准备的食物——叶尖嫩苞。
outside the store , meanwhile , touts try to entice customers in laminated pamphlets offering up to 25 per cent off the listed price .与此同时，在店外，券贩子正试图吸引顾客进店，他们手里拿着促销券，提供的折扣高达店内明示价格的25%。
they enticed a young girl away from home .他们诱骗了一个少女离家出走。

entry.def: An enticement is something which makes people want to do a particular thing.

example.ex: Among other enticements, they advertized that they would take guests to Ramsgate for the day.
example.tran: 除了其他诱人之处，他们还公开宣称说，会把客人们带到海滨圣地拉姆斯盖特玩一天。

means.word_mean: 1. something that seduces or has the quality to seduce
2. qualities that attract by seeming to promise some kind of reward
3. the act of influencing by exciting hope or desire;

auth_sentence.content: Yet slim yields on bonds and savings give stockholders little enticement to sell.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet slim yields on bonds and savings give stockholders little enticement to sell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet slim yields on bonds and savings give stockholders little enticement to sell.

auth_sentence.content: It is near the Florida Mall for great shopping if that is any enticement.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is near the Florida Mall for great shopping if that is any enticement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is near the Florida Mall for great shopping if that is any enticement.

auth_sentence.content: They also offer right-to-work laws as an enticement for businesses to come and set up shop.
auth_sentence.res_content: They also offer right-to-work laws as an enticement for businesses to come and set up shop.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They also offer right-to-work laws as an enticement for businesses to come and set up shop.

sentences.en: The enticements of the big city lured her away from her home.
sentences.cn: 大城市的种种诱惑吸引了她离家出走。
